author: apsallid
body:
#### PR description:

This PR contains the work done with @rovere , @felicepantaleo on updating the material budget analysis on the V10 (2023D41) HGCal geometry scenario. 

It updates the package with new materials (Epoxy, Kapton, HGC_G10-FR4, Aluminium), adjusting the z upper limit for HGCal in the zoom plot, since HGCal was moved with respect to V9, while it also adds the accumulated material budget file for use in the Validation/HGCalValidation package.  

#### PR validation:

There is a detailed set of slides ([1], a little large 15 MB) with comments on each material as well as overall. There is also a twiki [2] with for easy access with switches on better resolution plots in pdf. 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

No, it is not a backport. 

[1] http://apsallid.web.cern.ch/apsallid/MaterialBudgetV10_15April2019_CMGHGCal.pdf

[2] https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/Sandbox/HGCalMaterialBudget

@rovere @felicepantaleo @cseez @bsunanda @kpedro88 @malgeri
title: [HGCal] Material budget for V10 geometry scenario
